formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'SPEECH' =-
[Syntax] SPEECH(argument)
[Synopsis] Gets information about speech recognition results.
[Description] Gets information about speech recognition results. status: Returns 1 upon speech object existing, or 0 if not spoke: Returns 1 if spoker spoke, or 0 if not results: Returns number of results that were recognized
